articles.title: SEGA's Sonic at the Olympic Games – Tokyo 2020 races onto the Play Store - Android Police
articles.description: This past June, Sega announced Sonic at the Olympic Games – Tokyo 2020, a mobile game that appears to be similar in style to the Mario
articles.content:
Sonic at the Olympic Games - Tokyo 2020 launches today!
Los Angeles, 7 May 2020 - SEGA Corporation is proud to announce the worldwide release of Sonic at the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020. Please enjoy playing the game together on Android, iOS and Fire OS; availa… [+3028 chars]

articles.description: Call of the Sea is a first-person adventure puzzle game set in the 1930s that tells the story of Norah, a woman on the trail of her missing husband’s expedit...
articles.content: Call of the Sea is a first-person adventure puzzle game set in the 1930s that tells the story of Norah, a woman on the trail of her missing husbands expedition. The search takes place on a strange but beautiful island in the South Pacific, filled with secrets… [+111 chars]

articles.title: Alfa Romeo has updated the Giulia and Stelvio Quadrifoglio - Top Gear
articles.description: Includes: green paint and an infotainment system from this century, at last

Then, allow TopGear.com to make your day. Meet the subtly updat… [+1382 chars]

articles.author: Seren Morris
articles.title: Popular Google Doodle Games: Celebrate the Birth of Hip Hop in Today's DJ Game - Newsweek
articles.description: Learn about Kool Herc's party in 1973, and how he extended the instrumental breaks allowing people to dance for longer.
articles.content: Today's Google Doodle game is a throwback to 2017, when Google celebrated the 44th anniversary of the birth of hip hop. In today's game, users are invited to step into the role of a DJ and play legendary records on two turntables, while trying to meet ten DJ … [+3362 chars]

articles.author: Sean Carey
articles.title: New Forza game, Forza Street, available on mobile now - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Forza Stree is now available globally to download on both iOS and Android. The free to play mobile game has players competing in short, under-a-minute long races to unlock new cars.
articles.content: Forza Street is now available globally to download on both iOS and Android. The free to play game has players competing in short, under-a-minute races to unlock new cars. According to Forza Streets' design director, Andy Beaudoin, the game is designed to be a… [+1052 chars]
